file.name: root_file_reference_from_file.spec.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Test specification for the translating parser
  version: 0.0.0
paths:
  /hosts:
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          description: A file reference to a root file reference
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'root_file_reference_from_file_schemas.spec.yaml#/$defs/RefObject'
components:
  schemas:
    PlainObject:
      type: object
